column5: Is July 16-20 a bad time to go for walleyes north of Armstrong. (D'Alton Lake)?

You should do all right for the walleye's then. We do our annual trip the last part of July every year out of Nakina and we always catch more then enough fish to keep everyone happy. It's a great time of the year as the bugs aren't bad then the weather is usually good for swimming.
